title: Happy Birthday, Karin-chan!
detail_text: <:th_ch0103/>Karin-chan! Happy birthday! Come on, let’s go to the sea~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>Eh? The sea?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>Yeah. You’re one year older now, don’t you want to see a new world?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>Well, if there are things to see, yes.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>Mhmm, as expected for Karin-chan. So let’s go see the world under the sea!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>Are you trying to teach me how to dive?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>Yep. I’ll guide you even if you’re not that good at swimming. It’ll be easy!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>But I’m from.... No, never mind. Sure, take me there!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>That’s the spirit!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>I’ll show you how good I am in the sea!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
